function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper ventilation for air distribution","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Ensure proper air circulation and distribution","Technologies":"Ventilation systems and air purifiers","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Inefficient air distribution leading to temperature variations","Impact":"Discomfort and potential health issues","Mitigation":"Optimize air distribution and temperature control","Technologies":"HVAC systems and air duct design","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"HVAC engineers and building management"}]}
